title: Allotment according to classification prescribed in appropriation
context: ยง37-38 Allotment according to classification prescribed in appropriation. Allotments shall be made according to the classifications of expenditures prescribed in the appropriation measure as enacted by the legislature, and the funds allotted for each classification of expenditure shall be used for no other classification of expenditure. [L Sp 1959 1st, c 12, pt of ยง3; Supp, ยง35-26; HRS ยง37-38]
